name: Cat me if you keng
description:
Introduction

This is just a normal life of a street cat. Please don't let your lovely cat end up on the street.

Adopting Instead of Buying  Game Goal

Bump into 10 trash cans before the cat starves to death.

You will encounter hunters hunting you down, cat ladies feeding you and rats running away from you. Please be careful.

Controls

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Backward

D - Right

C - Meow (distract hunter)

E - Eat (eat fruits)

Q - Poop (trap hunter)

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump (cats can double jump)

P - Pause
